description: A cozy little game, about frogs and being a good friend

0.1.0.description:
# Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)
0.1.0.title: FIRST RELEASE!

- Cassette Shuffle
- Key Blocks now logically expect 7 Keys to unlock

0.4.0.description:
## New
- Snail Shop
- Snail Money (Filler Item)
- Mod:
  -  Assets
  - Menu UI (Press the Archipelago logo)
  - Tracker UI (Kiosk & Tickets)

## Changes & Fixes
- Start with ticket set to `false` won't fail generation
- Mod:
  - Made Pepper not disturb you in Home
  - NPCs that are effected by Contact List now only spawn with the Contact List (Item) and not via the Contact List (Object)
  - Trainmap & Whiteboard now correctly show the available checks based on Contact Lists
  - Mitch & Mai are now actually randomized in Gary's Garden (Why do they have a different Gameobject name in that scene??)
  - Progressive Contact List won't be duplicated upon reconnect 

## Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

0.5.0.description:
## New
**Locations:**
- Added missing Letter check from Tadpole HQ

**New Options!**
- Gary's Garden Access:
  - Choose between 3 options on how to unlock Gary's Garden
    - Tadpole HQ: Get access to Gary's Garden upon having access to Tadpole HQ
    - Tadpole HQ + Gary's Garden Ticket: Get access to Gary's Garden upon having access to Tadpole HQ & receiving Gary's Garden Ticket
    - Gary's Garden Ticket: Gary's Garden will be accessible in home, when obtaining Gary's Garden Ticket
 - Level Specific Keys:
   - Make Keys tied to a level, so you need the 'Hairball City Key' to open Hairball City locks
 - Fishsanity (Update):
   - Choose between 3 options on how you want Fishsanity to behave
     - Vanilla: no fishsanity
     - Location: Every fish has a unique item
     - Insanity: Same as location with the change that Fischer won't give you the item until you have all 5 fish for that level obtained.
    So you need the item 'Hairball City Fish' 5x before being able to obtain Fischer's reward in Hairball City.
    Check the in-game menu, to see if you have enough fish and obtained the reward from Fischer.
## Changes
- Location names are no longer mixed up & should make more sense
- Key locks now expect 7 keys in total to be in logic, due to 2 keys being leftover (7/9 are needed)
- Item & Location groups
- Options order
## Fixes
- Achievement - Volley Dreams now requires the second Contact List to be in logic
- Salmon Creek Forest - SPORTVIVAL now requires the first Contact List to be in logic

## Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

0.6.0.description:
## New
- Handsomefrog Gary's Garden
- Traps! - Freeze, Iron Boots, Whoops! & _(my favorite)_ My Turn!
- Speed Boost - Gain permanent movement speed bonus (limited quantity)
**New Options!**
- Seedsanity:
  - Vanilla: Normal Here Comes Niko! behaviour
  - Location: Every single seed you can collect with the hamster ball is a unique location
  - Insanity: Same as location with the change that Moomy won't give you the reward for collecting all seeds until you have been sent all 10 seeds for that level.
- Flowersanity:
  - Vanilla: Normal Here Comes Niko! behaviour
  - Location: Every single flower bed is a unique location
  - Insanity: Same as location with the change that Little Gabi won't give you the reward for completing all flower beds until you have been sent all flowers for that level.
- Applesanity: Every freestanding apple (not the ones spawning from bushes) has been randomized
- Cassette Logic (Update):
  - Level Based: Every level has unique cassettes
  - Progressive: The cost of Mitch/Mai will increase after every purchase
  - Scattered: Prices are randomly shuffled between all Mitch & Mai Locations *(unchanged)*
## Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

0.7.0r2.description:
## New
### Options:
- Bugsanity
  - Every single bug is a unique location
- Chatsanity (Level & Global)
  - Vanilla: Normal Here Comes Niko! behaviour
  - Level Based: Every single NPC you can talk to is a unique location in every level
  - Global: Every single NPC you can talk to is a unique location, but only once, regardless of level
  - Also adds the item 'Party Invitation'
- Thoughtsanity
  - Every Thought Niko can have is a unique location
- Bonesanity (Location & Insanity)
  - Vanilla: Normal Here Comes Niko! behaviour
  - Location: Every single bone you can collect in Blippy (Dog variant) is a unique location
  - Insanity: Same as location with the change that Bone Dog won't give you the reward for collecting all bones until you have been sent all 5 bones for that level.
- Safety Helmet
  - Breakable blocks need the 'Safety Helmet' to be broken
- Bug Net
  - Bugs can only be collected with the item 'Bug Net'
- Soda Cans
  - Soda cannons need to be repaired with 'Soda Repair' to interact with them
- Parasols
  - Parasols need to be repaired with 'Parasol Repair' to interact with them
- Swimming
  - Niko needs a 'Swim Course' to swim in (or touch) water
- Textbox
  - The item 'Textbox' needs to be acquired to talk with NPCs (duh)
- Air Conditioners
  - Air conditioners need to be repaired with 'AC Repair' to interact with them
- Apple Basket
  - Apples can only be collected with the item 'Apple Basket'
### New Traps >:)
- Gravity Trap
  - Zero gravity
- Home Trap
  - Sends Niko back to Home
- W I D E Trap
  - Makes Niko W I D E
- Phone Trap
  - Forces unskippable custom conversations ([Add your own custom ones!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSerwnoyg0X2XglCzutA3xTYO3w5wH_l55Ia1hW7ncOXPmsn0Q/viewform?usp=dialog))
- Tiny Trap
  - Makes Niko very tiny
- Jumping Jacks Trap
  - Makes Niko jump continuously
- Fast Trap (TrapLink exclusive)
  - Makes the game go 2x as fast
### Misc.
- DeathLink & TrapLink support (Enable via YAML or toggle in-game with '/deathlink' | '/traplink' respectively)
- Full Universal Tracker Support (requires no YAML)
## Changes
- Applesanity now includes ALL freestanding apples, so no more duplicate ones

## Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

## Logic

- Added "AC Repair" to 'Turbine Town - Blippy'
- Added "Swim Course" to 'Salmon Creek Forest - Game Kid'
- Added "Swim Course" to 'Salmon Creek Forest - Blippy'

- Added "Swim Course" to 'Hairball City - Nervous Frog (Chatsanity)'
- Added "Swim Course" to 'Salmon Creek Forest - Niko & a rock'
- Fixed typo in 'Turbine Town - Blippy Dog (Chatsanity)'
- Added Logic to 'Public Pool - Vlog Frog (Chatsanity)'
- Added Logic to 'Bathhouse - Vlog Frog (Chatsanity)'
- Fixed typo in 'Bathhouse - David D. Carota (Chatsanity)'
- Added "Swim Course" to 'Chatsanity - Nervous Frog'
- Added "Public Pool Ticket" as secondary access point to 'Chatsanity - Skippy'
## Installation

## What's Changed

## New Contributors

0.7.8.title: Here Comes Niko! APWorld 0.7.8 - Logic fixes

0.8.0.description:
## Options
- New Goal options
  - Custom
    - Collect a custom amount of coins to goal
    - Check the in-game stats menu to see how many are required!
  - Garden
    - Restore Gary's Garden by collecting 10 'Gary's Garden Seeds' (shuffles the garden seeds)
    - You can see your current amount of Gary's Garden Seeds in-game
  - Help
    - Help various NPCs by completing their task and become their best friend [More Details](https://github.com/niieli/Niko-Archipelago/blob/niko/worlds/hcniko/docs/en_Here%20Comes%20Niko!.md)
    - Also check out the in-game tracker to see which ones are missing!

- Speed Boost in Item Pool
  - Determines how many 'Speed Boost' are in the item pool
- Extra Cassettes in Item Pool
  - Choose how many extra 'Cassette' should be in the item pool
- DeathLink Amnesty
  - How many hazard touches until a DeathLink is sent
- Textbox (Level variant)
  - Every level requires it's own textbox

## Locations
- Added "Hairball City - Bone Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Hairball City - Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Hairball City - Dog 2 (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Hairball City - Kappa (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Turbine Town - Bone Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Turbine Town - Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Turbine Town - Dog 2 (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Turbine Town - Kappa (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Salmon Creek Forest - Bone Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Public Pool - Bone Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Bathhouse - Bone Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Tadpole HQ - Bone Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Tadpole HQ - Dog (Chatsanity)"
- Added "Tadpole HQ - Niko has nightmares (Thought)"
- Added "Chatsanity - Kappa"
- Added "Chatsanity - Bone Dog"
- Added "Chatsanity - Dog"
- Added "Chatsanity - Dog 2"

## Logic
- Added 'AC Repair' to "Turbine Town - Serschel & Louist"
- Added 'Parasol Repair' to "Public Pool - Niko & 2D (Thought)"
- Removed 'Swim Course' from "Gary's Garden - Hasselhop (Chatsanity)" due to swim course having no effect in Gary's Garden
## Change
- Changed 'Coin' & 'Cassette' to `progression_deprioritized_skip_balancing`
## Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/niieli/Niko-Archipelago/compare/0.7.8...0.8.0
0.8.0.title: Here Comes Niko! APWorld 0.8.0 - The Not Quite PR Update!

0.8.1.description:
## Logic
- Added 'Soda Repair' to "Achievement - Bottled Up"
- Added Elevator Check to "Tadpole HQ - Niko has nightmares(Thought)"
- Added 'Swim Course'/Precise Jump to "Tadpole HQ - Inbetween Four Skyscrapers"
- Added 'Swim Course' to "Public Pool - Breakable Boxes Near Frogtective"
- Added 4x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Bird" & "Gary's Garden - Bird (Chatsanity)"
- Added 2x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Conspiracy Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Conspiracy Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 8x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Dance Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Dance Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 5x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Danger Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Danger Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 3x 'Gary's Garden Seed' & 'AC Repair' to "Chatsanity - Dream Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Dream Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 7x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Fear Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Fear Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 1x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Flower Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Flower Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 2x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Handsome Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Handsome Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 10x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Hasselhop" & "Gary's Garden - Hasselhop (Chatsanity)"

- Added 6x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Chatsanity - Tourist Frog" & "Gary's Garden - Tourist Frog (Chatsanity)"
- Added 'AC Repair' to "Gary's Garden - Seed 4"
- Added 'Soda Repair' to "Gary's Garden - Seed 10"
- Added 1x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Gary's Garden - Small Rocks In Water"
- Added 3x 'Gary's Garden Seed' & 'AC Repair' to "Gary's Garden - Behind Large Rock"
- Added 4x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Gary's Garden - On Tree Branch"
- Added 5x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Next To Smaller Tree"
- Added 6x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Next Garden Seed On Rocks"
- Added 7x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Beginning Of Giant Gold Scissor"
- Added 7x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Near End Of Giant Gold Scissor"
- Added 8x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Tree Branch Near Gold Scissor Row"
- Added 9x 'Gary's Garden Seed' & 'Soda Repair' to "Tree Branch Near The Top"
- Added 10x 'Gary's Garden Seed' to "Gary's Garden - Gunter (Chatsanity)"
## Installation
1. Double click the apworld or open ArchipelagoLauncher and `Install APWorld`
2. Open ArchipelagoLauncher 
3. `Generate Template Options` to get the yaml or use the one under the release

## Playing
1. Setup your yaml and put it in `...\Archipelago\Players`
2. Click `Generate` on the ArchipelagoLauncher
3. `...\Archipelago\output` should have a AP_XXX.zip
4. Host locally via `Host` on the ArchipelagoLauncher OR Upload the zip to the [website](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
5. Follow the Install instructions for the [Mod](https://github.com/niieli/NikoArchipelagoMod?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/niieli/Niko-Archipelago/compare/0.8.0...0.8.1
